name: prop-types

scripts.umd: NODE_ENV=development browserify index.js -t loose-envify --standalone PropTypes -o prop-types.js
scripts.umd-min: NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js -t loose-envify -t uglifyify --standalone PropTypes  -p bundle-collapser/plugin -o | uglifyjs --compress unused,dead_code -o prop-types.min.js
